sentences.en: a row of recently built houses
sentences.cn: 一排新建的房子

sentences.en: a wall with shelving that was built in; build stability into the economy.
sentences.cn: 建造有架子的墙；建立经济的稳定性

sentences.en: a woman of slim build
sentences.cn: 身材苗条的女子

sentences.en: Build her up with kindness and a sympathetic ear.
sentences.cn: 用友善和富有同情心的倾听来重拾她的信心。

sentences.en: build up the product with a massive ad campaign; built up my hopes after the interview.
sentences.cn: 通过大量的广告活动来树立这种产品；在面试后增加我的希望

sentences.en: built up the business; building up my endurance for the marathon.
sentences.cn: 扩大企业；为跑马拉松而增强我的耐力

sentences.en: Deposits of plaque build up between the tooth and the gum.
sentences.cn: 牙齿和牙龈之间会滋生牙斑。

sentences.en: Developers are now proposing to build a hotel on the site.
sentences.cn: 开发商现在建议在这个地方盖一座宾馆。

sentences.en: Developers want to build on the site of the old gasworks.
sentences.cn: 开发商想在煤气厂的旧址上造房子。

sentences.en: Dr. Johnson and I have been trying to build him up physically.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊医生和我一直试图增强他的体质。

sentences.en: Exercise in pregnancy can build up your strength and suppleness.
sentences.cn: 孕期锻炼身体可以增强体力和柔韧性。

sentences.en: He was tall, with an athletic build.
sentences.cn: 他高大健壮。

sentences.en: I am determined to build on this solid foundation.
sentences.cn: 我决定在这个坚实的基础之上继续努力。

sentences.en: I wanted a more athletic and muscular build .
sentences.cn: 我想拥有更加健壮、结实的体格。

sentences.en: If you build more plastics into cars, the car lasts longer.
sentences.cn: 如果汽车采用更多塑料元件，寿命会更长一些。

sentences.en: It is the female birds that build the nests.
sentences.cn: 筑巢的是雌鸟。

sentences.en: Jean is pretty, of slim build, with blue eyes.
sentences.cn: 珍妮非常漂亮，身材苗条，有一双蓝色的眼睛。

sentences.en: Nuclear plants are expensive to build, though cheap to operate.
sentences.cn: 核电站造价高昂，虽然运转费用低廉。

sentences.en: sediment building up on the ocean floor.
sentences.cn: 海底积累的沉积物

sentences.en: She dusted herself down and left to build her own career.
sentences.cn: 她重振旗鼓去开创自己的事业了。

sentences.en: She had built a reputation as a criminal lawyer.
sentences.cn: 她已经树立起了刑事诉讼律师的声望。

sentences.en: She’s been busy building her career.
sentences.cn: 她忙于创建自己的事业。

sentences.en: The money to build the power station ought to have been sufficient.
sentences.cn: 建设电站的资金本该足够了。

sentences.en: The purpose is to build new houses for local people.
sentences.cn: 目的是要为当地居民建造新的住宅。

sentences.en: The road took many years to build.
sentences.cn: 这条路修了好几年。

sentences.en: They needed $3 million to build the bridge.
sentences.cn: 他们需要300万美元来修建这座桥。

sentences.en: We can build up the speed gradually and safely.
sentences.cn: 我们可以逐渐稳妥地提高速度。

sentences.en: We hear endless injunctions to build a sense of community among staff.
sentences.cn: 我们听到上面没完没了地讲要在员工中培养一种集体归属感。

sentences.en: We must build on our recent success.
sentences.cn: 我们必须依靠现有的成功

sentences.en: Workers at the plant build the F-16 jet fighter.
sentences.cn: 这个工厂的工人建造F-16喷气式战斗机。

sentences.en: You’re a surprisingly strong swimmer for one of such a slight build .
sentences.cn: 你个子这么瘦小，想不到竟是游泳高手。

phrases.tran_cn: 建造，建立：作为一个整体来建设或包括在内
使固定于；使成为组成部分
依赖，依靠…；建立于；把…建立于…；以…为基础
对…抱有更大希望（变得更加乐观）

trans.tran_en: the shape and size of someone’s body

trans.tran_cn: 建造，创立，发展，逐渐增强
trans.tran_en: to make something, especially a building or something large

trans.tran_cn: 建造，建筑；建设，建立；增大，加强
trans.tran_en: to make something, especially a building or something large
to make something, especially a building or something large
